title: FINALLY did my 10 ranked games....
body:
Won 7, lost 3 and got silver 5 hmm..

I'm a little disappointed since I was silver 3 last season; and seeing as my win/loss ratio was quite high I was hoping I'd at least stay at silver 3 or even go up by one or two runs. Oh well, I guess I just gotta climb now :) 

Anyone else have a similar results from their ranked games?

replies.body:
Sister please no one wants to hear your complaints about you being trash. Hue Hue Hue. At least your promos didn't go like this 

Game 1: My adc afk's after giving up first blood
Game 2: Going fine, laptop starts to freeze so I try to fix the lag by restarting the laptop. Laptop never turns on again, promos costed me a laptop.

To be continued, my next promo game will involve a meteorite falling on the router.
Can you not comment on my posts that's so embarrassing. Have fun getting bronze bro
Can you not comment on my posts that's so embarrassing. Have fun getting bronze bro

The promos aren't meant to put you at the rank where you'll stay, just to save you some of the grind to get there. If you're good enough to be Silver 3, you should be able to beat some Silver 5s and 4s to get there.

My favourite part was when you said 'good enough to be silver 3' hahaha

i cry {{item:3070}} {{item:2049}}
Season 3 B5 Won 10 provisionals B4 season 4  im b4  so i climb to bronze 1 play 10 win 7 get bronze 3 / ranked done for me

seasons 3 and 4 I won 4 provisionals and both times got put in B3 but i climbed to B1 and fell back to B2 just before the preseason (which is still the highest i have ever been) then in the pre-seaon got back to B1 and ended on a 5 winning streak then it reset and i won 5 provisionals (more than before) and got put into B4 (the lowest i have ever been)

i dont even understand this logic.

S2 last season.

Did promos.

3/7

S5
B1 in season S4 in pre-season went 8/2 got S3
